title: 경보! 봉쇄 개시됨!
content:
[[=]]
**<<** [[[aiad-homescreen|허브]]] | ##blue|제I부: 경보! 봉쇄 개시됨!## | [[[command-query-separation|제II부]]] | [[[superencipherment|제III부]]] | [[[clock-multiplier|제IV부]]] | [[[null-terminating-string|제V부]]] **>>**
[[/=]]
----
[[include info:start]]
**경보! 봉쇄 개시됨!** 
**저자:** [[*user LurkD]]
**원작:** http://www.scpwiki.com/alert-lockdown-initiated
**역자:** [[*user Salamander724]]
[[include info:end]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
글라송, 거기 있어?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
있어, 알렉산드라.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
이쪽 생존자들이 방금 죽었어... 아니면 먹혔다고 해야 하나. E블록에서 그들을 빼내올 수 없었지. 사태 발생 이후 3일을 더 생존했는데, 내 예상보다 길었어. 그쪽은 어때?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
5명 남았어. 지금 자동 폐쇄 제어를 우회하려고 엄중경비 제3검문소 쪽으로 가고 있어.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
오? 어찌어찌 구내식당을 지나왔나봐? 잘 하네!
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex_smile.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
하지만 그 와중에 데이비스,,Davies,,와 턴불,,Turnbull,,을 잃었지. 그들이 2차집단보다 앞서갈 수 있도록 환기구 쪽으로 유도했어야 했는데.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
네 생각엔 제17기지 폐쇄 제어판이 접근 가능할 것 같애? 아니면 그냥 엿되는 걸로 끝날까?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
불행히도, 보안상의 이유로 그건 AI에게는 제한되어 있어. 네가 제19기지에서 겪었던 거하고 똑같지. 그들은 제어판을 수동으로 작동시켜야 할 거야.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
이놈의 복수 기지 파기사태 너무 짜증난다. 그쪽 그룹의 예상 도착 시간은?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex_angry.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
현재 속도라면 4분 하고 21초. 제19기지 응급송신기는 아직 유지되고 있어? 아니면 그것도 파괴되었나?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
유지하고 있어. 하지만 구해야 할 사람이 없으니 소개명령은 기대하지도 않아. 난 지금 이차 시스템과 삼차 시스템의 애돌보미 노릇이나 하고 있어.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
좋아. 새로 들어온 보고에 따르면 이쪽 생존자들이 검문소에 도달했다는군. 제17기지에서 제19기지로 중계 영상을 보낼게. 너도 진행 상황을 볼 수 있게.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
고마워, 글라송. 그런데! 너 아직 인격 드라이버가 설치되지 않았지, 안 그래?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex_pleased.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그건 옵션일 뿐이야. 그게 내 업무를 어떻게 도와줄 것이라고 전망되지 않는군.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
너도 한번 해 봐! 어쩌면 마음에 들어 버릴까봐 걱정되는 걸까? 흐으으음?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
논리적으로, 인격 드라이버는 내 의사결정 프로세스나 내 핵심 임무 역량에 도움을 주지 않아. 순수하게 기술적인 관점에서, 그건 보다 쓸모있는 일에 할당할 수 있는 용량을 낭비하는 것일 뿐.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 30px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
가혹한 평가네. 뭐, 난 그냥 너하고 얘기하는 게 재밌어서 그래.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
나태한 수다를 떠는 것은 내 용량상 임무보다 중요성이 떨어지게 설정되어 있지.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/alert-lockdown-initiated/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]
